SEARCH
Package main.java.boundaries

Class StaffApp

java.lang.Object
main.java.boundaries.StaffApp
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppDisplay
public class StaffApp extends Object implements AppDisplay
The StaffApp class represents the entry point for staff users. It is a boundary level object that interacts with staff users. This class provides functionality for staff users to log in, choose their role, and access corresponding functionalities based on their role. This App is implemented from AppDisplay interface.
Since:
24-Apr-2024
Version:
1.5
Author:
SDDA Team 1

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute(Scanner scanner)
      Executes the login page display for staff. This method displays a login portal where staff users can choose to either login (1), or change password (2) It checks if staff input is valid within 1-2.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface AppDisplay
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object for user input.

    • loginProcess

      private void loginProcess(Scanner scanner)
      Executes the login process. This method asks staff for their username, password, and role. It then checks and authenticates the username and password to verify that the details are correct. If authenticated, it will create views according to their role, otherwise it displays an appropriate error message.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object for user input.

    • enterRole

      private void enterRole(Scanner scanner)
      This method prompts staff to choose their role from the login portal. It validates the staff's input and sets the staffRole attribute accordingly.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object for user input.

    • changePasswordProcess

      private void changePasswordProcess(Scanner scanner)
      This method facilitates the changing of password for all staff members It asks users to enter their username, old and new password. It then prints out a message according to whether the password has been successfully changed or not.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object for user input.
